item.title: Offline Orientation
item.description: In this session we are going to talk about our society and just give you guys a brief glimpse on what its about working at ATOM Robotics society.

item.title: Online Orientation
item.description: Session synopsis In this session we talked about what A.T.O.M is going to be about. A robotics community based out of MAIT Delhi. We then introduced the projects a little and talked about the selection process.
